transArray.content: The check-in environment is very good, very good. The front desk service is very good. There is also free parking lot. The environment is also very clean. I recommend it. I will stay with them again when I come to Beijing in the future. It is very good.

Simple, clear, and powerful! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving such a comprehensive review and recognition. Your support is the driving force for our continuous progress. All hotel staff will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay environment. Use our attentiveness to exchange for your comfort when you check in. We look forward to your every visit and wish you a healthy and happy life!
